txt.en: Nestled in the foothills along the Greylin, a curious company of dwarves has built a small encampment in Elderslade.

'Well now... what brings you to the Slade, traveller?

'For my part, I am Nagli Want-kin... a free dwarf like all of the others who dwell here at Khadâsh-gâra.

'Come, let us talk.'

'Can it be? [placeholder]? Now don't tell me you've forgotten me! Is it the beard?

'It wasn't so long ago you and I worked together to help rebuild Thorin's Hall. After all... they'd left it quite the mess. I journeyed long after I left Ered Luin, and I did not come to the Slade until quite recently. To my good fortune, I found my companions along the way. Some of them were as I was, nearly fooled by the false promises of Angmar, and others... well, they had forsaken their names long before our paths crossed.'

Nagli Want-kin pauses.

'You wonder why I won't say it, don't you? I do not fear to speak the name Dourhand, but neither do I wish to claim it. That age of my life is ended. I am Nagli Want-kin, and that is that.

'But I, as I always shall, still count you among my friends. Here, you are welcome!

'Come, let us talk!'

The dwarf encampment can be found in the foothills of eastern Elderslade.\n\nAfter investigating the dwarf-encampment in Elderslade, your presence has caught the attention of one of the dwarves. You should speak to Nagli Want-kin.
One of the dwarves appears to notice your approach...

While travelling through Elderslade, you have caught a glimpse of a strange sight. There appears to be a small dwarf-encampment in Elderslade, nestled in the foothills along the Greylin.

None of your maps have such a location marked on them, and it appears to have been built much more recently than any of the ruins that remain in Elderslade.

You should investigate the dwarf-encampment and attempt to learn why these dwarves have settled in Elderslade and so near to Mount Gundabad.
You have discovered a small company of dwarves at an encampment in the foothills of Elderslade. You should investigate the encampment and learn why these dwarves have settled in Elderslade.
